name: text-io-3.4.1
body: - issue #25: Disable Event Expansion for Strings Containing Exclamation Marks '!'

name: text-io-3.4.0
body: - issue #24: allow customizing the error messages associated with numbered options

name: text-io-3.3.0
body: - New methods in SwingTextTerminal: getDocument, appendToInput, replaceInput, getPartialInput (issue #17)

name: text-io-3.2.1
body: - issue #16: handle editing when the cursor is outside of the current input item

name: text-io-3.2.0
body:
- add Automatic-Module-Name to MANIFEST.MF
- replace findbugs with spotbugs
- remove all JavaFX dependencies

name: text-io-3.1.4
body: - fixes a memory leak in SwingTextTerminal (thanks to @mattco98 )

name: text-io-3.1.3
body: - small fixes in textterm.js

name: text-io-3.1.2
body: - small fixes in textterm.js

name: text-io-3.1.1
body: - implemented abort() for SwingTextTerminal and JLineTextTerminal

name: text-io-3.1.0
body:
- added InputReader.withPropertiesPrefix()
- added TextTerminal.executeWithPropertiesPrefix()
- added standard prefix `error` for error messages
- added JLineTextTerminal.dispose()

name: text-io-3.0.0
body:
- new TextTerminal features:
  - line control:
    - resetLine(): clears the current line.
    - moveToLineStart(): moves the cursor to the start of the current line.
  - bookmarking:
    - setBookmark(bookmark): sets a bookmark at the current position.
    - resetToBookmark(bookmark): clears the text after the given bookmark.
  - action execution while temporarily modifying the terminal properties:
    - executeWithPropertiesConfigurator(propertiesConfigurator, action)
    - applyWithPropertiesConfigurator(propertiesConfigurator, action)
  - action handlers:
    - registerHandler(keyStroke, handler)

- InputReader-specific properties:
  - withPropertiesConfigurator(propertiesConfigurator)

- API changes: parameterized generic types

name: text-io-3.0.0-alpha-3
body:
- added InputReader-specific properties
- added read handlers

name: text-io-3.0.0-alpha-2
body: - new TextTerminal method: `moveToLineStart()`

name: text-io-3.0.0-alpha-1
body:
- new TextTerminal methods:
  - resetLine(): clears the current line.
  - setBookmark(bookmark): sets a bookmark at the current position.
  - resetToBookmark(bookmark): Clears the text after the given bookmark.
- API changes: parameterized generic types

name: text-io-2.8.0

name: text-io-2.0.0

- SwingTextTerminal based on JTextPane
- removed AnsiTextTerminal
- MockTerminal renamed to MockTextTerminal

name: text-io-1.1.0
